name: Reaching singularity
description:
Sometimes it can be hard to make sense of ideas without having some rationalized concept to guide as a reference. 

From our most infant memories 
To our more traumatized adult mind.

There is a part of us from which ideas and thoughts are created.
This point of origin which births our consciousness, and expands just like the universe did, once.

Just as we nurture the process of thinking, so do we give birth to the idea of thought. 

Maybe this will make more sense when we die, or if you had ever done dymethyltriptamine, or dmt, or when ai catches up to the human mind.

Singularity, just like 0-9,.so it returns 
Life is the breath of the infinite mind.

Here is an interesting link i found on singularity from our current social perspective written by William levin.

https://www.americanthinker.com/articles/2020/12/the_singularity_what_it_is_and_why_it_matters_more_than_anything_else.html
